alert.note: Alert for Kay (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 29 at 10:44PM CDT until March 29 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL KAY COUNTY... At 1043 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Chilocco to 3 miles northeast of Newkirk to near Kildare to near Ponca City, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Broadcast media reported quarter size hail in Blackwell. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ponca City, Tonkawa, Newkirk, Kaw City, Kildare, Chilocco, Kaw Lake, Hardy and Peckham. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
